room_title: Escape room "Wolf-En-Stein" by MindBreak in St. Louis
review: We didn't know exactly what to expect for our group event but once we got started it was fun and a unique way to be out together.

room_title: Escape room "Wolf-En-Stein" by MindBreak in St. Louis
review: With 3 teenagers, it's not always easy to find good family bonding activities. All 5 of us had a great time and we finished with 9 minutes to spare! The kids are still talking about it!

room_title: Escape room "Wolf-En-Stein" by MindBreak in St. Louis
review: Had a great time. Super unique and not like your regular franchised escape room. The owner was super sweet, check them out !
